job_title: Java Microservices Developer with Healthcare exp
jd: From: Praveen Kumar, Magicforce praveen@magicforce.us Reply to: praveen@magicforce.us Job Title: Java Microservices Developer with Healthcare expLocation: RemoteDuration: 1+ Year Job Description:Mandatory skills:•Java, Apache Camel, Spring Boot, PLSQL, SOAP services, batch execution Good to have skills:•Strong proficiency in SQL, including query development and optimization•Nice to have knowledge of healthcare domain especially payer domain and knowledge of Health plans and HRP with emphasis on claims operations, financial reconciliation, enrollment, claims process and track transaction manager for any failures, data hubs and data governance.•Creating inbound / outbound Integration interfaces from HealthEdge's HealthRules Payor (HRP) system.Responsibilities: -•Should be good in development of application on Java, Apache Camel, Spring Boot, PLSQL, SOAP services, batch execution•Creating inbound / outbound Integration interfaces from HealthEdge's HealthRules Payor (HRP) system.•Should be able to perform regular SDLC independently and understand requirements and user stories independently•Develop Java codes adhering quality processes•Should be able to document into designs, review requirements and peers work•Communicate with Product Owners and client representatives for understanding requirements and conducting demonstrations•Able to assist team leads with their responsibilities•Should be able to adhere Agile methodology, JIRA and bitbucket tools•Should work on everyday Incidents such as PROD Job failure and HRP UI issues
